\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	{X_n \times |\Delta ^n|} \&\& {X_n \times |\Delta ^m|} \&\& {X_m \times |\Delta ^m|} \\
	{(a,x)} \&\& \bullet \&\& {(b,y)}
	\arrow["{(1,|\Delta^\varphi |)}", from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{(X_\varphi, 1)}"', from=1-5, to=1-3]
	\arrow[maps to, from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow[maps to, from=2-5, to=2-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
